1. You need a recent version of jdk installed on your machine to run the code.
2. Run the ReadHack_2.jar file to check out our implementation of Database Search and display mechanism
3. Give the username and ph.no as "realhack" and "admin" respectively to check out the existing history table of people who queried the database
4.Run the NotifyTrigger.jar to check out the Triggers for sending automatic notifications via SMTP E-Mail to the related email id's in the area.
